entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is a house-elf who is trying to escape from something.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is curious about Winky's behavior and asks Harry why she can't run properly.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry thinks that Winky didn't ask permission to hide, similar to what Dobby did when he tried to do something the Malfoys wouldn't like.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who was forced to beat himself up every time he tried to do something the Malfoys wouldn't like.

entities.name: malfoys
entities.description: The Malfoys are a family that Dobby and Winky seem to be afraid of.

relationships.description: Harry thinks that Winky's behavior is similar to what Dobby did when he tried to do something the Malfoys wouldn't like.
Ron is curious about Winky's behavior and asks Harry why she can't run properly.
